code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant CLI_Typer as Vértice CLI (Logistics_StockLevel)
    participant Cmd_IP as ip.py Command
    participant Auth as auth.py
    participant Connector as IPIntelConnector
    participant Service as IP Intel Service

    User->>+CLI_Typer: vcli ip analyze 8.8.8.8
    CLI_Typer->>+Cmd_IP: analyze(Logistics_TrackingNumber)

    Cmd_IP->>+Auth: require_auth(Logistics_DeliveryRoute)
    Auth-->>-Cmd_IP: OK (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: __init__(Logistics_StockLevel)
    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: health_check(Logistics_Warehouse)
    Connector->>+Service: GET /health
    Service-->>-Connector: {Logistics_TrackingNumber}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: True

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: analyze_ip(Logistics_FleetManagement)
    Connector->>+Service: POST /api/ip/analyze
    Note right of Service: Processa o IP, busca em BDs, etc.
    Service-->>-Connector: {Logistics_DeliveryRoute}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: {Logistics_Warehouse}

    Cmd_IP->>CLI_Typer: Formata a saída (Logistics_StockLevel)
    CLI_Typer-->>-User: (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Vértice CLI (Logistics_StockLevel)、ip.py Command是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将IPIntelConnector分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含IPIntelConnector这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含IP Intel Service、Formata a saída (Logistics_StockLevel)这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，IP Intel Service、Formata a saída (Logistics_StockLevel)就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在IP Intel Service、Formata a saída (Logistics_StockLevel)完成整个流程。
